title: Focus on Indie Media Platform
description: Prioritize Ahoy Indie Media as primary revenue stream. Ship MVP, stabilize infrastructure, build audience.

title: Teaching as Stable Income
description: Package and sell 4 ready-to-run curricula. Target 2 contracts per season in Greater New Haven area.

title: Maintain $5k Monthly Floor
description: Mix retainers, teaching, and freelance. Cover $3.5k expenses, save the rest for land and emergency fund.

title: Land Acquisition
description: Build wealth bucket toward land purchase. Scout properties, understand financing, prepare for opportunity.

title: Film Production Pipeline
description: Complete Act I of Creatures in the Tall Grass. Establish production workflow, test equipment, build team.

title: Personal Systems Simplification
description: Keep LifeOS static. No backend complexity. JSON-driven, manual editing in Cursor. Focus on content over infrastructure.

title: Client Work Boundaries
description: CPC work: finish admin portal, deliver media gallery. Then evaluate ongoing relationship vs. time allocation.

title: R&D Projects
description: Zuki robot: minimal MVP in Snorlax shell. RouteScout: stabilize Android build, log land leads. Keep experimental.
